name: Forage (AShortKid)
description:
The main objective in this game is to pick up (Forage) all the empty cans that are littered around the forest. There is a total of 30 cans across the entire map, They are hiding well so be sure to look carefully.

This is my first game by the way, so don't have high expectations.

Contact Information is : theforagegame@gmail.com
